attributes.action: Keep ITV3  and 4 whilst getting rid of shopping and gaming channels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In many parts of the country we have been told that we will lose ITV3 and 4. Lots of people will miss these channels. Could not some of the less used channels be removed instead?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
